caption.p: Garcinia cowa and Phyllosticta sp. YGE41 crude extracts differentially affected NHEJ-deficient cells. The cells were treated continuously with ethyl acetate crude metabolites from Garcinia cowa Roxb. Ex Choisy and Phyllosticta sp. YGE41 to determine cell viability. The experiment was repeated with biologically independent replicates. Data are shown as the mean ± standard deviation. Student’s t-test was performed at 6.25, 12.5, 25, and 50 μg/mL of Garcinia cowa and Phyllosticta sp. YGE41. Definitions: DMSO, dimethyl sulfoxide; 53BP1 −/−, 53BP1 knockout; RAD54L −/−, RAD54L knockout.
